Terms of Service

Paid Features and AI Scanner Terms

1. Paid Access and Scope

ReFURRM offers certain advanced tools, including the AI Unit Scanner and AI Item Scanner, exclusively to paid subscribers under the Pro tier. These tools are designed to estimate the approximate resale value of non-personal items visible in user-submitted or publicly available storage unit photos.

2. Limited Use and Purpose

The AI Scanner tools are provided solely for informational purposes to assist users in evaluating the potential resale value of visible, physical goods such as furniture, appliances, or equipment. They must not be used to analyze, identify, or assign value to personal or sentimental property, private images, or any material that could contain personally identifiable information.

3. Accuracy and Liability Disclaimer

ReFURRM does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any valuation generated by the AI Scanner. Estimated resale values are algorithmic projections derived from available market data and may not reflect actual sale prices. Users acknowledge that they rely on these tools at their own discretion and risk.

4. Ethical and Legal Compliance

By accessing and using paid features, users agree to comply with all applicable laws and ReFURRM's ethical use standards. ReFURRM reserves the right to suspend or revoke access to any paid feature if a user attempts to upload personal, confidential, or inappropriate content, or misuses the AI Scanner outside of its intended valuation purpose.

5. Non-Refundable Digital Services

Fees paid for Pro or subscription access cover digital services and platform maintenance. All payments are non-refundable, except where required by law or at ReFURRM's sole discretion in the event of a verified technical failure.
